p: Cadmium chloride (CaCl 2) was obtained from Sigma Chemicals Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). Kidney function diagnostics kits were obtained from Crescent Diagnostics (Jeddah, KSA). Antibodies (primary as well as secondary) were procured from Santa Cruz (Dallas, TX, USA). Chemicals used were of analytical grade and high quality that did not require further purification.
